graph_title: Proportion of medium and high-tech industry value added in total value added
indicator_name: Proportion of medium and high-tech industry value added in total value added
indicador_disponible: Proportion of medium and high-tech industry value added in total value added
objetivo_global: 9- Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
meta_global: 9.b Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities
definicion: Proportion of gross value added of the manufacturing sector corresponding to medium-high and high technology activities
formula:
$$PVAB_{manufacturing\, medium-high\, and\, high}^{t} = \frac{VAB_{manufacturing\, medium-high\, and\, high}^{t}}{VAB_{manufacturing}^{t}} \cdot 100$$

where:

$VAB_{manufacturing\, medium-high\, and\, high}^{t} $ = gross value added of the manufacturing sector corresponding to medium-high and high technology activities in year $t$

$VAB_{manufacturing}^{t} $ = gross value added of the manufacturing sector in year $t$
observaciones:
Medium-high and high technology manufacturing activities are considered activities with CNAE-2009:

Medium-high technology 
- 20: Chemical industry 
- 25.4: Manufacture of weapons and ammunition 
- 27 to 29: Manufacture of electrical material and equipment; Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.c.o.p; 
  Manufacture of vehicles motor, trailers and semi-trailers 
- 30 except 30.1 and 30.3: Manufacture of other transport material except shipbuilding, aeronautical construction 
  and spacecraft and its machinery 
- 32.5: Manufacture of medical and dental instruments and supplies

High technology 
- 21: Manufacture of pharmaceuticals
- 26: Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products
- 30.3: Aeronautical and space construction and its machinery
texto_oceca: Indicator calculated using a methodology harmonised across the central statistical bodies of the autonomous communities
justificacion_global:
Industrial development generally entails a structural transition from resource-based and low technology 
activities to MHT manufacturing activities. 

A modern, highly complex production structure offers better opportunities for skills development 
and technological innovation. MHT activities generally correspond to the industries with higher 
value addition and labour productivity. Increasing the share of MHT sectors also reflects the 
impact of innovation. 

Source: United Nations Statistics Division
dato_global: Proportion of medium and high-tech manufacturing value added in total value added (%) NV_IND_TECH UNSTATS
comparabilidad: The available indicator complies with United Nations metadata.

es.indicador_disponible: Proportion of medium and high-tech industry value added in total value added
es.objetivo_global: 9- Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
es.meta_global: 9.b Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities
es.definicion: Proporción del valor añadido bruto del sector manufacturero correspondiente a las actividades de media-alta y alta tecnología
es.formula:
$$PVAB_{manufacturero\,media-alta\, y\, alta}^{t} = \frac{VAB_{manufacturero\,media-alta\, y\, alta}^{t}}{VAB_{manufacturero}^{t}} \cdot 100$$
donde:

$VAB_{manufacturero\,media-alta\, y\, alta}^{t}$ = valor añadido bruto correspondiente a las ctividades manufactureras de media-alta y alta tecnología en el año $t$

$VAB_{manufacturero}^{t}$ = valor añadido bruto total del sector manufacturero en el año $t$
es.observaciones:
Se consideran actividades manufactureras de media-alta y alta tecnología las actividades 
con CNAE-2009:

Media-alta tecnología
- 20: Industria química
- 25.4: Fabricación de armas y municiones
- 27 a 29: Fabricación de material y equipo eléctrico; Fabricación de maquinaria 
y equipo n.c.o.p;   Fabricación de vehículos de motor, remolques y semirremolques
- 30 excepto 30.1 y 30.3: Fabricación de otro material de transporte excepto 
construcción naval, construcción aeronáutica y espacial y su maquinaria
- 32.5: Fabricación de instrumentos y suministros médicos y odontológicos

Alta tecnología
- 21: Fabricación de productos farmaceúticos
- 26: Fabricación de productos informáticos, electrónicos y ópticos
- 30.3: Construcción aeronáutica y espacial y su maquinaria
es.texto_oceca: Indicator calculated using a methodology harmonised across the central statistical bodies of the autonomous communities
es.justificacion_global:
El desarrollo industrial generalmente implica una transición estructural desde 
actividades basadas en recursos y de baja tecnología a actividades manufactureras de MAT. 

Una estructura de producción moderna y altamente compleja ofrece mejores oportunidades 
para el desarrollo de habilidades y la innovación tecnológica. Las actividades 
de MHT generalmente corresponden a las industrias con mayor valor agregado y 
productividad laboral. El aumento de la participación de los sectores de MAT 
también refleja el impacto de la innovación.

Fuente: División de Estadísticas de las Naciones Unidas
es.dato_global: Proporción del valor añadido de las manufacturas de tecnología media y alta en el valor añadido total (%) NV_IND_TECH UNSTATS
es.comparabilidad: El indicador disponible cumple con los metadatos del indicador de Naciones Unidas.
